text: Karate is the debut extended play by English singer-songwriter Anne-Marie. It was released on 10 July 2015 via Major Tom's and Asylum Records. The EP, as well as its singles, failed to make an impact on world record charts, although Anne-Marie would later achieve success with her debut album Speak Your Mind and its singles. == Composition == Karate is an R&B; extended play that incorporates musical elements of electro-grime, electronic music, and soul. == Singles == "Karate", the EP's title track, was released as the lead single on 13 May 2015. "Gemini" was released as the EP's second single on 24 June 2015. == Critical reception == Pierre Bayet of High Clouds called the EP "bright". == Track listing == Adapted from iTunes.
